title: CURP Usage
content:

(c) (C) (r) (R) (tm) (TM) (p) (P) +-

!!!!!! ???? ,, – —

Emphasis #  This is bold text
This is bold text
This is italic text

Blockquotes #   Blockquotes can also be nested…

  Consectetur adipiscing elit
  Integer molestie lorem at massa

  …or keep all the numbers as 1.

Indented code

Sample text here... Syntax highlighting
var foo = function (bar) { return bar++; }; console.log(foo(5)); Tables #     Option Description     data path to data files to supply the data that will be passed into templates.   engine engine to be used for processing templates. title: 日本語
content:
こんにちは。
このページは日本語の表示テストです。
タイトルに日本語使えないみたいです。残念。
ちなみにkatexという仕組みでtex記法で数式を埋込むことができます。こんな感じに
  \(f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\)
